document.full_text: cincinnati's jay bruce delivered a bases-clearing double in the ninth inning to help the reds snap a six-game losing streak with a 6-3 win over national league east leaders philadelphia tuesday.
document.title: bruce blow earns reds rare win over phillies
lines_and_colors: cincinnati's jay bruce delivered a bases-clearing double in the ninth inning to help the reds snap a six-game losing streak with a 6-3 win over national league east leaders philadelphia tuesday.
